name: Funding for Future B.V.
goal:
To address the housing crisis in EE as it accelerates from simple housing poverty to lack of housing by developing a EE wide industry to renovate, renew existing building stock using energy savings as the finance tool.
“ the Esko Ekosystem aligns the interests of all stakeholders on those of the final beneficiary: the homeowner.”
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
2012 Energy Efficiency Directive
Housing directives
Cohesion policies
EUROSTAT rules on EnPC
